ðŸ“– Summary: Scrum Agent is an open-source tool that integrates Discord and Taiga to streamline agile workflows. It automates task tracking, facilitates efficient communication, and provides tools for managing user stories and issues. The bot aims to improve project oversight and team collaboration for small to large development teams.
